channel.title: Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Vulpes vulpes and Corvus brachyrhynchos
item.description:
Spotted in the greater Ypsi-Arbor metropolitan area:

Vulpes vulpes (the red fox), photographed by Ben Connor-Barrie for Damn Arbor in A visit from the Normal Park Fox.

Corvus brachyrhynchos (the American crow), darkening the skies and narrated by @annarborcrows .

Many more wildlife spottings are in the Town fauna page on Arborwiki.

item.title: muskrat love
item.description:
As part of a "town fauna" series on AnnArbor.com, I wrote this piece on a muskrat rescue by a 4th grade group on a field trip to a water treatment plant.

I take no small measure of pride in the first comment: "thank god for the ann arbor news and their hard-hitting muskrat coverage. unbelievable."
